nodes.text: "Victory Celebration" is a concert piece and theme composed by John Williams for Star Wars: Episode VI Return of the Jedi. It was performed by the London Symphony Orchestra.
It plays during the Ewok and Rebel celebrations after the Battle of Endor. It replaced "Ewok Celebration" in the Special Edition of Return of the Jedi.
A mournful rendition of the theme is played as ambient music on the planet Taris in the 2011 massively multiplayer online role-playing game Star Wars: The Old Republic.
